reviews.review_msg: You guys need to clam down, she is actually one of the successful and most respected member at SFU. She is on several executive committee such as CMC, NSERC and etc. I guess we are sometimes too caught on teaching skills and grades, but the bigger picture is different. In real life, no one will be teaching you, you need to learn by yourselves.
i found this guy to be very smart, patient, and helpful. most people are afraid to approach him because he looks scary, but he's really nice once you approach him...
